com.esri.mo2.map.core
Interface Canvas

All Known Subinterfaces:
Layout, Map
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseLayout, Map, Map, PageLayout
public interface Canvas

defines methods that are common to both a Map and a Layout. This can be useful when application code wishes to work with either Map or Layout. A typical usage might be an application wishing to export an image based upon a given extent. Note that the meaning of extent is different in either case. For a Map, the extent is defined by coordinates within the Map's CoordinateSystem, and, the full extent is the Envelope containing all extents of Layers within the Map. For a Layout, the extent is defined by coordinates within the printer units, and the full extent is the Envelope defined by the page boundary. In either case, the "extent" represents the current viewing area of the Canvas, while the "full extent" is the largest viewing area that contains viewable data.

Method Summary
 Envelope getExtent()
          get a copy of the current extent of this Canvas
 Envelope getFullExtent()
          get a copy of the full extent of this Canvas
 BufferedImage getImage(Dimension imageSize)
          gets an image of given size showing the current content of this Canvas.
 BufferedImage getImage(Dimension imageSize, Envelope extent)
          gets an image of given size showing the content of this Canvas based upon the given extent.
 boolean setExtent(Envelope extent)
          sets the current extent of this Canvas If the new extent is no different from the current value of getExtent() then nothing is changed
 

Method Detail

getImage

public BufferedImage getImage(Dimension imageSize)
gets an image of given size showing the current content of this Canvas. Uses the current extent of the Canvas.

Parameters:
imageSize - the size of the image required
Returns:
an image
See Also:
getImage(Dimension,Envelope)

getImage

public BufferedImage getImage(Dimension imageSize,
                              Envelope extent)
gets an image of given size showing the content of this Canvas based upon the given extent. Note that the imagesize must match the aspect ratio of the extent, otherwise additional data may be shown unexpectedly.

Parameters:
imageSize - the size of the image required
extent - the extent of the Canvas that is required to be shown
Returns:
an image
See Also:
getImage(Dimension)

setExtent

public boolean setExtent(Envelope extent)
sets the current extent of this Canvas If the new extent is no different from the current value of getExtent() then nothing is changed

Parameters:
extent - the new extent
Returns:
True == the new extent is changed from the previous one, False == otherwise.

getExtent

public Envelope getExtent()
get a copy of the current extent of this Canvas

Returns:
the Canvas extent

getFullExtent

public Envelope getFullExtent()
get a copy of the full extent of this Canvas

Returns:
the Canvas full extent
